participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting through music.
participant_1.background: I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix. I started dating again and went to the movies on Sundays with my new love. I always make sure my dog is well fed. I bond with my brother over music and go to concerts. I enjoy spending my free time cosplaying with my husband.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Creative and hands-on, loves to explore new hobbies and enjoys an active lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I like to make things with my hands. I won a golf trophy in a tournament when I was 10 years old. I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head. I like to take photos. I am fluent in Spanish.

content.text: Hey there, I am looking for someone to talk to.
Hi, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking. I just got back from a concert and I am trying to wind down.
Oh nice! What band did you see?
I saw The Avett Brothers and they were amazing!
Oh nice! I love their music. I saw them in concert a few years ago and they were really good.
Yeah they are one of my favorite bands. I am going to see them again in October when they come to town.
Oh cool! I will have to check and see if they are coming to my city.
You should! They are a great live band and they put on a great show.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to make things with my hands. I am really into woodworking and I also like to do pottery.
Oh that is cool! I do not have much of a creative bone in my body. I mostly like to watch Netflix and go to concerts.
I love to watch Netflix too! I am currently watching The Crown and I am really enjoying it.
Oh nice! I have heard good things about that show. I am going to have to check it out.
You should! It is really good.
So what do you do for work?
I am a software engineer.
Oh nice! I work in marketing.
Oh cool! I know a few people in marketing.
Do you like your job?
I do, it is a lot of fun and I get to work on a lot of different projects.
That is great! It sounds like you have a lot of hobbies and interests.
Yeah, I try to keep myself busy. I like to stay active and I love to learn new things.
That is awesome! I am glad you are so happy.
Thanks! I am pretty happy with my life
